message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $950000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. Can you consider that?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $900000. What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about $875000?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $885000. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you consider $870000?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I'm now offering the product to you for $880000. This is my final offer. What do you think?
I understand this is your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. Can you consider $860000?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'm sticking to my final offer of $880000. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're sticking to your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time. Can you consider $870000?
